Text: Does it work for anyone? It causes my wdtv player hangs up. I think it's a fake. I'm trying to repack it into .ts file, but after 60% the resulting file is already 5,5GB.
fubus - Remux using mmg (mkvmerge); using no compression setting.

when I try to transfer this file to network folder my Windows Explorer crashes. There is something strange with this file. I f....ing almost reinstalled system before checking with other file transfers. Only this fucker is making windows explorer crash!
